description:
Before it would launch, had to go into console and
echo "AMD_DEBUG=nodmacopyimage" > .bashrc
and logout/reboot.

This brought up the main menu, where it said there was an update available (why it said this as I was using a flatpak version, I have no idea) but the game would lock if I clicked yes.

It does manage to play if you don't click update. It does not quit properly. Some more time in the oven is necessary.

ISSUE: This game is apparently an abandonware, also unplayable.

Installed Quetoo version: 0.1.0

On my system: NixOS 23.05 (GNOME Wayland)

Issue: Unplayable because there is this popup: "Update now?". I clicked [Yes] to update but doesn't do the update or anything and it won't let you play either.
summary: ISSUE: Apparently is an abandonware, also unplayable

description: Its a free FPS, you must try it (if you like First Person Shooters)
